channel.title: Comments on: REVIEW: The Arcade Fire, Neon Bible, Merge

item.title: By: Arcade Fire "Surf City Eastern Bloc" Mp3
item.dc:creator: Arcade Fire "Surf City Eastern Bloc" Mp3
item.description: [...] “No Cars Go”, a song originally off the band’s debut EP that was re-recorded for Neon Bible in a far more grandiose manner. The b-side, “Surf City Eastern Bloc”, is also an older [...]
